name: You Are The Dragon
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 33 - Vote here

My second game, and first Ludum Dare! Hurray for me :)

(Note: Technically, you can't win. The game will never end.)

MAP: To the right. It is crude, but will give you a sense of where you are.

There's a bug where you can't pick up enemies and can't breathe fire. If that happens, you have to go back to the menu and restart. Sorry! :/

**************************************************************************

Goal:
Get as many gold coins as you can!
Destroy everything!

Controls:
WASD - Fly
HOLD Right Mouse Button - Breath Fire! (Has a cool down)
HOLD Left Mouse Button - Fly low
RELEASE Left Mouse Button (while flying low) - Grab enemy below you
Left Mouse Button (while holding something) - Drop it

Game:
Soldiers - Kill for gold coins! They shoot arrows at you!
Caravans - Kill for gold coins, DROP for even more coins!
Wizards - You cannot pick them up, super powerful, will fire ice spells at you which renders your fire breath useless!
Buildings and Trees - You can burn them;
